entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 3:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
